entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
